name: Zenith Flyers
description:
Fly, shoot, and use special abilities to defeat endless waves of space ships! This game was a final project for Video Game Design I in the Webster University Game Design program.

CONTROLS

  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • Right Mouse - Thrust
  • Space Bar - Special Ability

CREDITS

  • Matt Burton
  • Joshua Glover
  • Noah Green
  • Andrea Hammond
  • Kari Jordan
  • Henry Lankford
  • Nick O'Connell
  • Dalton Scott
  • Justin Thompson

NOTE: For the best experience, download and run the .exe.
